ROOT.WhereFaultState: WHERE F.resume_time IS NULL AND F.fault_time>=SYSDATE-2
ROOT.GetFaultState: SELECT d.st_id,F.EQUIP_ID from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_PWRTRANSFM_H_FAULT F LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_pwrtransfm_b d ON F.EQUIP_ID=d.id same:WhereFaultState UNION ALL select d.st_id,F.EQUIP_ID from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_BUSBAR_H_FAULT F LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_busbar_b d ON F.EQUIP_ID=d.id same:WhereFaultState UNION ALL select d.st_id,F.EQUIP_ID from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_GENERATOR_H_FAULT F LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_generator_b d ON F.EQUIP_ID=d.id same:WhereFaultState UNION ALL select F.EQUIP_ID,F.EQUIP_ID from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_H_FAULT F same:WhereFaultState UNION ALL select F.EQUIP_ID,F.EQUIP_ID from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_DCLINE_H_FAULT F same:WhereFaultState UNION ALL select POLE.st_id,F.EQUIP_ID from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONVERTER_H_FAULT F LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONVERTER_B d ON F.EQUIP_ID=d.id LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_DCPOLE_B POLE ON D.DCPOLE_ID=POLE.ID same:WhereFaultState
ROOT.GetJxpState: SELECT b.plan_id_d,r.outage_dev_id,r.st_id,b.status FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_evn_outageplan_b_day b JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_evn_outageplan_r_day_dev r ON b.plan_id_d=r.plan_id_d where b.status=1002 AND AUTH_START_DATE<=SYSDATE AND AUTH_END_DATE>SYSDATE
